title: Junior/Senior Frontend Developer (ReactJS)
description: Mô tả công việc

The Programmer / Developer will be a key part of the Information technology department that builds, supports, and scales the IT business applications or projects of South Asia services and entities. This individual will ensure the systems are within quality and meeting the service performance expectation
Responsibilities
Responsibilities

Involved in design, develop, and maintain user-facing features using React.js
Translate design Figma into high-quality code
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate RESTful APIs
Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers 
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs 
Debug and resolve issues in the frontend codebase 
Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code following industry best practices
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features for one or more system applications 
Prepares technical and user documentation.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Proven experience as a Frontend Developer in MERN stack applications, and integrating enterprise systems
Proficiency in React.js, including React Hooks, Context API, and state management libraries (e.g., Zustand, Redux, or MobX)
Strong proficiency in HTML., CSS, and Javascript (ES6+)/Typescript
Experience with frontend build tools like Webpack, Babel, and Vite
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries (e.g., Axios, GraphQL)
Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git, GitHub, or Bitbucket)
Experience with responsive and adaptive design
Understanding of code optimization, security best practices, and cross-browser compatibility
Demonstrable portfolio of projects in the technologies listed above 
Process strong analytical skills

About Skylink Innovation:

About Skylink Innovation:

At Skylink Innovation, we are reshaping the future of how businesses manage customer relationships with innovative CRM solutions. Join a team that thrives on creativity, collaboration, and a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences. As part of our design team, you’ll have the opportunity to make a real impact and grow your career in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
